description:
Most beginners fail in trading because they don't know what they are doing. They don't know how much risk they are facing in each trade. And even if they have good trades most of the time they exit early and leave a lot of money on the table.

This course is all about kinds of risk and how eliminate them. Obviously you can't eliminate risk totally as if  you are safe, but  if you follow these simple rules you will be more disciplined and thus make money easily.

This course is mainly for traders. If you are a trader in stocks this course is for you.

This course is a must for all traders who want to protect their trades and their profits.
title: How to Minimize Risk and Maximize Profits?
